title: Project for Scientific Identity Formation through Participation in Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and team project experience
context.additional_context: Conducting science domain problem-solving projects in collaborative environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners enhance their scientific problem-solving competencies through meaningful interactions with peers at least 10 times during the 4-week project period.
Learners define their scientific identity by writing weekly reflective journals based on shared feedback within the learning community.
Learners present a 15-minute summary of personal reflections and social learning experiences gained during the scientific inquiry process at the final presentation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
